jobDescription: Overview  Provides basic financial/administrative analysis support to Credit Analysts and Underwriting Staff. Responsibilities The Credit Analyst Intern is responsible for the following: Lend support in gathering and analyzing credit information on current and potential borrowersLend administrative supportOffers regional client support as neededData inputQualifications Must be currently enrolled in a bachelor degree program in junior or senior year with a concentration in finance, accounting, or similar  Must have excellent verbal and written communication skillsSDL2017
